ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 16 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5300 Digital SLR Camera & 18-140mm VR DX AF-S Lens (Black) + <2> Nikon 70-300mm G VR AF-S Lens + <3> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case + <4> Spare EN-EL14/a Battery +
<5> Battery Charger + <6> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <7> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <8> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<9> 67mm UV Filter + <10> Additional 67mm UV Filter + <11> Universal Pop-Up Diffuser + <12> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<13> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote + <14> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <15> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <16> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5300 Digital SLR Camera (Black) & 18-140mm & 70-300mm VR Lens with 64GB Card + Case + Flash + Battery/Charger + Tripod Kit
